title: 12 Ways to Make a Capricorn Man Fall for You

steps.title: Capricorns are typically drawn to people who invest in their appearance.
steps.content: Capricorns are typically drawn to people who invest in their appearance. You don’t have to wear expensive clothes or follow fashion trends. Instead, focus on looking put-together. Choose clothes that are clean and wrinkle-free, and pick outfits that make you feel confident. [1] X Research source Since Capricorns are earth signs , they’re more drawn to down-to-earth looks rather than flashy clothes. For instance, you might wear a classic pair of dark jeans with a striped tee for a dressed-down look. If you’re going out, you might go with dress slacks and a nice button down or a sleek dress. Choose subtle accessories or go with one statement piece.

steps.title: Capricorns love a bright mind and value education.
steps.content: Capricorns love a bright mind and value education. Talk freely about topics that interest you, and share your opinions openly. A Capricorn man will happily discuss topics at length, and they’ll appreciate what you have to say. [2] X Research source You could say, “I was just watching a documentary about Pompeii. I had no idea they had hours to escape before the volcano eruption buried the city. Can you imagine?” Spend some time brushing up on current events and the news so you have an opinion to share. Watch documentaries and read about topics that interest you to expand your knowledge .

steps.title: Although Capricorns are serious, they also enjoy a good laugh.
steps.content: Although Capricorns are serious, they also enjoy a good laugh. If you’re a naturally witty person, let the jokes fly. [3] X Research source If not, don’t worry—we’ve got you! Start by learning a few jokes you can sprinkle into conversation. Additionally, practice telling stories about your life in a humorous way. Once you’re in a conversation with your guy, try calling-back to something said earlier in the conversation to make him laugh. [4] X Research source Use jokes like, "What do you call an illegally parked frog? Toad!" or "Why are elevator jokes amazing? They work on different levels!" When all else fails, just laugh at yourself! When it comes to life stories, talk about minor mistakes that you laugh about now. You might share the time you slipped on the way to accept an award or when you spilled food all over yourself on a first date. Here’s how you do a call-back. Let’s say you and your guy are ordering tacos, and you accidentally say “fork” instead of “pork.” When you’re chatting over your meal, you might say something like, “I never knew fork tacos were so good!”

steps.title: Capricorns are driven, and he wants a partner who appreciates this.
steps.content: Capricorns are driven , and he wants a partner who appreciates this. Talk to him about what he wants out of life, and tell him he can do it. Additionally, be his sounding board when he needs help. Encourage him to keep going, especially when times are tough. Hopefully, he’ll do the same for you. [5] X Research source You could say something like, “I love that you want to start your own business. I know you can do it!” or “You’ve been working so hard to improve your run times. I can’t wait to see how well you do in the race on Saturday!” [6] X Expert Source Tara Divina Vedic Astrologer Expert Interview. 20 November 2019.

steps.title: Capricorns strive for success—and they expect you to do the same.
steps.content: Capricorns strive for success—and they expect you to do the same. Go after the life you want ! [7] X Research source Identify a goal that’s really important to you, then break it down into a practical to-do list. Next, start working on step one. Share your goals and progress with your man so he sees your ambition. [8] X Research source For example, you might decide to learn a new language . Your to-do list might include downloading a language app, committing to daily lessons, conversing with native speakers, and reading a book in your new language. You could start today by picking a language app. Similarly, you might have a goal to turn your painting hobby into a side business . Your to-do list might be getting prints of your paintings, setting up an online store, and advertising your work. You could start today by choosing the paintings you think will sell well.

steps.title: Capricorns need their independence so they can achieve their goals.
steps.content: Capricorns need their independence so they can achieve their goals. But that doesn’t mean you have to sit around waiting for your guy! Instead, build your independence by spending time alone and going after what you want. Schedule time to work on your goals, take classes to learn new skills, and spend time with your friends. He’ll be impressed by what a strong, independent person you are. [9] X Research source Be open with him about needing time to do you. Say something like, “I’m really focused on reaching my goals, and I’m sure you are, too. I think it’s important that we both have time to do what makes us happy.”

steps.title: Because they’re ambitious, Capricorns like feeling accomplished.
steps.content: Because they’re ambitious, Capricorns like feeling accomplished. Tell him that you’re impressed by him so he feels flattered. Additionally, ask him for help or advice to show him you value his knowledge and opinions. [10] X Expert Source Tara Divina Vedic Astrologer Expert Interview. 20 November 2019. He’ll feel the love from you, and it’ll make him more likely to return your affection. [11] X Research source You could say, “Wow, your job sounds so challenging!” or “You seem so accomplished! What advice would you give someone trying to make it in your industry?”

steps.title: Capricorns are very trustworthy, so they expect honesty.
steps.content: Capricorns are very trustworthy, so they expect honesty. If you’re not honest, you might lose his trust forever. Be direct and truthful in everything you say, and make an effort to always keep your promises. [12] X Expert Source Tara Divina Vedic Astrologer Expert Interview. 20 November 2019. Over time, he’ll see that you’re as loyal and honest as he is. [13] X Research source If something comes up and you can’t keep a promise, let him know immediately so he recognizes that you didn’t lie. Reader Poll: We asked 1250 wikiHow readers how they would handle a Capricorn who doesn’t prioritize their relationship, and 53% said they would communicate their feelings and expectations clearly and assertively. [Take Poll]

steps.title: Since Capricorns are so serious, they don’t get mixed up in drama.
steps.content: Since Capricorns are so serious, they don’t get mixed up in drama. Your guy won’t be impressed by gossip or messy relationships. Don't share rumors or talk badly about your friends or coworkers. Additionally, consider spending less time with friends who like to behave immaturely. [14] X Research source Gossiping can be super hard to stop. Instead, focus on talking about positive topics, like your interests or pop culture. If you find yourself gossiping about someone, switch gears by saying something nice about them. As an example, let's say you were talking about how your friend Tara keeps quitting her jobs. You could switch up and say, “Tara is so smart! I hope she finds success soon.”

steps.title: Family is really important to Capricorns.
steps.content: Family is really important to Capricorns. This doesn’t mean you should start planning a family with him right away. However, he’ll enjoy hearing that you care about your family, so be open about your relationships with them. Additionally, share your family traditions with him and ask about his. [15] X Research source If you don’t have a great relationship with your family, it doesn’t mean you can’t impress a Capricorn. Lots of families have problems, so don't feel bad about it. Instead, talk about your chosen family or how important your friends are to you.

steps.title: Capricorns don’t like to rush things.
steps.content: Capricorns don’t like to rush things. Don’t expect a quick commitment from your guy. Instead, enjoy getting to know him. [16] X Expert Source Tara Divina Vedic Astrologer Expert Interview. 20 November 2019. Have long talks, maintain a text conversation, and invite him on dates or group hangs. Hopefully, he’ll extend an invitation back to you. Once you get to know him, it’ll be easier to win his heart. [17] X Research source Try inviting him to a group hangout if you’re just getting to know each other. For instance, plan a game night or invite several friends to go play mini golf. If you’ve been talking for a while, ask if he wants to chat over coffee or dinner. Capricorns typically enjoy conversation. Be an active listener when you’re having a conversation. Later, bring up things he said to show him that you listen and care about getting to know him. You could say, “Last time we saw each other you were working on a big project. How did that go?”

steps.title: Capricorns value stability, so they appreciate organization.
steps.content: Capricorns value stability, so they appreciate organization. No one’s expecting you to have everything in your life totally together. However, your guy will be impressed if you keep yourself organized . [18] X Expert Source Tara Divina Vedic Astrologer Expert Interview. 20 November 2019. Use a planner or calendar to help you track your responsibilities, and keep your home and personal belongings as tidy as possible. Additionally, create a budget to help you manage your finances. [19] X Research source If you’re not naturally organized, don’t stress yourself out trying to pretend you are. Instead, take small steps to be more organized, like writing things in a planner and cleaning out your bag. Your initiative will be very impressive!
